Home

  • M1k37h0r is a beta project created to give participants a new way to exercise the mind.
  • The Week’s Puzzles: It  is open to everyone, and everyone can send the answers through the form.
  • The Monthly Competition: It  is open to all, however only members can post answers.
  • Admission Test:  Give the right answers for the 10 questions to become a member of Tribe.
  • The Pages: Downloads, Forum and Members can be only accessed by Members.
    The puzzles in the website are of own authorship.
  • Social Media: M1k37h0r is connected to facebook, instagram and Twitter.
  • Collection:The puzzles on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter are parts of a collection of 10 000 puzzles of various authors

 

Take the admission test

 

I hope you enjoy.
